long_description: Representing a new breed of sport earbuds, the X-1 Momentum Earbud Headphones allow you to hear your music and your surroundings without having to sacrifice quality sound or a comfortable fit. Ultralight headphones are designed for all sizes of ears. Listen to music or take phone calls without blocking out surrounding noise. In-line remote works with iPods and iPhones, allowing control of volume and playback as well as placing/receiving calls and activating SIRI. Designed with an IPX rating of IP4 to withstand heavy perspiration, these headphones endure all types of weather and can be rinsed after use for a fresh, clean fit. Choice of three included ear-tip sizes allows for a customizable fit that keeps headphones in place during rigorous activities. The X-1 Momentum Custom Headphones feature a reflective, tangle-resistant cord that offers extra visibility in low light.
short_description: Representing a new breed of sport earbuds, the X-1 Momentum Earbud Headphones allow you to hear your music and your surroundings without having to sacrifice quality sound or a comfortable fit.
